name: scriptura
description: Un framework HTML/CSS/JS généré via Pug, Stylus et JavaScript.
author: Olivier Chavarin

scripts.js: pnpm jsserviceworker | pnpm jsserviceworker2 | pnpm jsmain | pnpm jsformvalidation | pnpm jsimagefocus | pnpm jsaccordion | pnpm jscodeblock | pnpm jsrange | pnpm jslinemark | pnpm jsmap | pnpm jsyoutube | pnpm jsclienttest
scripts.jsmain: terser scripts/development/base.js scripts/development/masonry.js scripts/development/tab.js scripts/development/readablePassword.js scripts/development/pieChart.js scripts/development/barChart.js scripts/development/mediaPlayer.js -o scripts/main.js -c -m
scripts.css: pnpm cssprint | pnpm cssprism | pnpm cssgridf | pnpm cssexp | pnpm cssmain
scripts.cssmain: postcss styles/development/main.css --use postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-simple-vars postcss-minify --output styles/main.css --watch --verbose --map
scripts.cssexp: postcss styles/development/main.css --use postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-simple-vars --output styles/expanded/main.css --watch --verbose --map
scripts.cssprint: postcss styles/development/print.css --use postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-simple-vars postcss-minify --output styles/print.css --watch --verbose --map
scripts.cssgridf: postcss styles/development/gridFallback.css --use postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-simple-vars postcss-minify --output styles/gridFallback.css --watch --verbose --map
scripts.cssprism: postcss styles/development/prism.css --use postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-simple-vars postcss-minify --output styles/prism.css --watch --verbose --map
scripts.icon: pnpm svgo && pnpm sprite && pnpm html
scripts.svgoutil: node tasks/iconUtil && svgo --config tasks/svgoConfig.cjs -f medias/icons/utilSrc -o medias/icons/utilDest
scripts.svgoplayer: node tasks/iconPlayer && svgo --config tasks/svgoConfig.cjs -f medias/icons/playerSrc -o medias/icons/playerDest
